price: I prije njih su narod Nuhov, i Ad, i faraon – vlasnik moćnih vojski – poricali,
arabic: كَذَّبَتۡ قَبۡلَهُمۡ قَوۡمُ نُوحٖ وَعَادٞ وَفِرۡعَوۡنُ ذُو ٱلۡأَوۡتَادِ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: kadhabat qablahum qawmu nūḥin waʿādun wafir'ʿawnu dhū al-awtādi
